spell.name: Zyrgin's Heat
spell.description: When cast upon an existing fire, it increases its efficiency by 50%, adding this to the burning time. The spell will affect fires up to size 5 (campfire).

spell.name: Sphere of Shanakar
spell.description: Summons a ball of ethereal fire, which appears at the point specified. Placing it on a sentient creature allows a will roll to resist the spell. Once summoned, the ethereal fire provides light and heat, though it only effects sentient creatures. If it is touched, it causes +5 fatigue damage. It has the brightness of a torch.

spell.name: Caress of Pelena
spell.description: Warms an item up to size 3 by a few degrees. Each round the spell is concentrated on, the object will approach human body temperature.

spell.name: Aidan's Hastening
spell.description: Hastens the actions of a creature, enabling them to move 50% quicker than normal. This also gives a base +3 bonus to attack, defence and damage, and four times this (+12) to initiative. However, fatigue rolls must be made every round of combat. The spell will affect a creature up to size 6.

spell.name: Skin of Lexesh
spell.description: Protects a target up to size 6 from the effects of fire, granting it a +10 bonus to soak against heat.

spell.name: Awakening of Murazor
spell.description: The target is forced to wakefulness as if from a bad dream. More powerful castings can affect all creatures in range. The target is awake, aware and flushed with energy, though this will only last a couple of rounds.

spell.name: Eyes of Niyar
spell.boost: +30 Can tell apart objects of the same temperature
spell.description: An enchantment which causes the eyes of the target to perceive distinctions in heat instead of light. The subject perceives gradations in temperature as variations in colour. The enchanted eyes cannot see normally. This kind of infravision does not allow one to distinguish objects of similar temperature.

spell.name: Murazor's Bolt
spell.description: The spell causes a flame to appear in the caster's hand, which can then by thrown at a target as a bolt of fire. The flame can be held for as long as the spell is concentrated on, but ends when the bolt is thrown. If the bolt hits, then it does +20 damage to the target. The caster uses her throw skill, and the target may dodge. The flame is made of ethereal fire, and has an attack bonus of +6.

spell.name: Ariondh's Firedarts
spell.description: Creates three darts of ethereal fire which shoot forth towards a single, or multiple, targets, hitting with the caster's throw skill at +6, doing +18 stun damage. Each target beyond the first gives a -3 penalty to all throw rolls. Against the same target, there is one dodge roll and one attack roll.

spell.name: Orb of Zatara
spell.description: Creates a small ball of fire in the caster's hand which may be thrown (using his throw skill at +6) at a target. On contact with a solid object, the ball explodes in a 1m radius ball of flames, causing +15 damage.

spell.name: Fires of Nep
spell.description: A ball of fire arcs away from the caster, exploding over the area designated. Flaming droplets rain down on the area beneath, igniting any combustable material they land on. The flare is as bright as daylight over the area, and there are about a dozen flaming droplets with land randomly over the area. If they hit someone, they will do +10 stun damage, but its unlikely unless the spell is cast over a large crowed.

spell.name: Arc of Fiery Ribbons
spell.description: Causes fiery tendrals to shoot from the caster's hands, over a sixty degree arc out to the range of the spell. Anyone caught by the flames suffers +30 damage. The flames hit with an attack of 40 (no roll), and can only be dodged. The defence gets a bonus equal to the range (e.g. +10 at 10m).

spell.name: Charadhi's Fever
spell.description: The target of the spell becomes affected by a magical fever, which at first makes them restless and impatient. They will be forever pacing, running or otherwise being energetic. They will be unable to sleep properly. Each day, the target's body temperature will rise as if they suffer from a fever. The strength of the illness is 40, and has a time of Day/5. The effects of the illness are fever / fever / coma / coma / death. A creature up to size 9 can be affected.

spell.name: Hornet Fire
spell.description: Creates a swarm of burning motes which burn and sting those they are sent against. The number of hornets is initially 6, and can be sent against one target or split between many. Each round a stamina roll is made to ignore them. Failure means that the target suffers a penalty to all actions. The penalty is equal to 5 x number, to a maximum of -15.

spell.name: Sea of Fire
spell.boost: +60 Duration concentration, fire can be terminated
spell.description: Ignites flammable material within range. A single area may be ignited, such as a field or wood. Anything easily flammable in the area will ignite. Clothing or equipment on sentients is protected by a will resist from the creature. Anyone caught in the blaze will tend to suffer from +10 to +20 stun damage each round (ignoring armour) from the flames, depending on the amount of flammable material.

spell.name: Pilum of Fire
spell.boost: +40 Bolt can be split into multiple bolts, splitting the damage as desired
spell.description: Causes a bolt of fire to form and strike at the target, using the caster's throw skill at +12. If it hits, the bolt does +50 fire damage to the target.

spell.name: Passage of Ahnu
spell.boost: +20 Caster can choose to double or halve duration, decided before the duration is rolled
+40 Caster can choose to double or halve duration, decided after it is rolled
+80 Caster can choose duration, between 1 round and 60 hours
spell.description: The spell causes the caster's body to immolate in ethereal fire within a round of caster the spell, leaving nothing but a thick black smoke. ONly the caster's body is affected. The smoke will drift on the wind until the spell terminates, at which point the caster will reform. She is unconscious for the during of the spell, and has no control over her movement. The spell lasts d20 + 10 hours.

spell.name: Fiend of Hazatai
spell.description: This spell creates a burning tower of ethereal fire, vaguely humanoid in shape. It can be moved around within range of the spell, being used to burn targets as desired. The fiend attacks with the caster's throw skill at +16, and does +50 damage, halving worn armour because of its tendency to totally envelop the target. It effectively has +20 soak and 5 body levels against water based attacks. It can be moved at 100m/round.

spell.name: Doom of Zhatran
spell.boost: +50 Fireball can explode at any point on its path
+100 Fireball can explode at any point, and continues moving until it reaches the range of the spell, causing damage to all targets it passes over
spell.description: Creates a small ball of fire which appears in the caster's hand, and which can then be thrown out to the range of the spell, using the caster's throw skill at +20. On hitting a solid target, it explodes over a 15m radius area, doing +70 damage.
